levels.description:
Passive Effect: Each Ore 'Killer' can be manually detonated once armed, which deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all enemies in range and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</>s
Active Effect: obtain an Ore 'Killer' immediately
